rooms.name: Bedroom
rooms.description: What your room looks like is your own business.  I'm guessing there's a bed so the name makes sense.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: Good idea coming in here.  Making one's self presentable at work makes everyone's day better.

rooms.name: Hallway
rooms.description: It is long and looks as if it stretches on forever, like how this week feels already.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: This is where you acquire things to stave off starvation.

rooms.name: Outside
rooms.description:
It's the great wide open.  There's a hot burning thing in the sky and a method of transportation
 you can use to head to work.

rooms.name: Overflow Lot
rooms.description:
It may only be a block or so away from work, but it feels like another state.  There is a lot of
 chain link fencing.

rooms.name: Main Entrance
rooms.description: You stand at the back door to RSI.  I hope you brought your fob to get in.

rooms.name: Print Shop
rooms.description:
Just inside RSI's back door is the domain of the elusive print elves.  Their industrious creations
 bring joy to all RSI denizens.

rooms.name: Your Cube
rooms.description:
Home away from home.  This is where you stow your stuff, play with your computer, and act productive
 for the bulk of the day.

rooms.name: Break Room
rooms.description: There are tables, chairs, a foosball table, and vending machines.  Heck, some people even eat in here.

rooms.name: Restrooms
rooms.description:
Hidden in this back nook are the restrooms.  Oddly enough, this is a fairly popular locale.  
Hopefully, there are paper towels.

rooms.name: The Blind Mule
rooms.description: This restaurant/bar is somewhat dim when you walk in.  The staff bustles by with someone else's food.  It really does look good.
